resources.string: Tap the lemon tree to select a lemon
A tree with ripe lemons ready for selection. Tap on the tree to choose a lemon.
Keep tapping the lemon to squeeze it
A lemon that you can tap to squeeze the juice. Tap to continue squeezing the lemon.

A glass of fresh lemonade with a lemon slice. Tap to enjoy your drink.
A lemon with a fresh slice. Tap to start the lemonade-making process again.
